API_Description: Opens a file dialog that allows the user to select multiple documents, returning an array of file paths.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'browseForMultipleDocs' suggests functionality for browsing and selecting multiple documents. This aligns with typical file dialog operations in applications.
Returns: An array of strings, each representing the file path of a selected document.
Returns_Reason: The method is expected to return file paths for the selected documents, which are typically represented as strings in an array when multiple selections are allowed.

cFilenameInit.description: The initial filename or path to display in the file dialog.
cFilenameInit.description_reason: The parameter name 'cFilenameInit' implies it sets an initial filename or path in the dialog.
cFilenameInit.type_reason: Filenames and paths are typically represented as strings.

cFSInit.description: The initial file system path to display in the file dialog.
cFSInit.description_reason: The parameter name 'cFSInit' suggests it initializes the file system path in the dialog.
cFSInit.type_reason: File system paths are generally represented as strings.

bUnicode.description: Indicates whether the file dialog should support Unicode file names.
bUnicode.description_reason: The parameter 'bUnicode' suggests a boolean flag for enabling Unicode support.
bUnicode.type_reason: Boolean flags are used to enable or disable features.

cFileFilter.description: A string specifying the file types to display in the dialog, using a filter pattern.
cFileFilter.description_reason: The parameter 'cFileFilter' implies a filter for file types, typically a string pattern.
cFileFilter.type_reason: File filters are usually specified as strings with patterns (e.g., '*.pdf').

cWindowTitle.description: The title of the file dialog window.
cWindowTitle.description_reason: The parameter 'cWindowTitle' suggests it sets the window title for the dialog.
cWindowTitle.type_reason: Window titles are represented as strings.

bAllowMultiple.description: Specifies whether the dialog allows selecting multiple files.
bAllowMultiple.description_reason: The parameter 'bAllowMultiple' indicates a boolean flag for enabling multiple file selection.
bAllowMultiple.type_reason: Boolean flags are used to enable or disable features.
